Module com.example.software2
Package com.example.software2

Class AddAppointment

java.lang.Object
com.example.software2.AddAppointment
public class AddAppointment extends Object
The controller for the form to create and edit Appointments. It is created as a Create form, and is changed to an Edit form when an AppointmentInstance is applied with setAppointment
